info.title: ⭐ Native - Routing Basics Quick Start
info.description:
Curated quick-start collection for routing basics.

Cisco IOS-XE Native Configuration - Routing-Basics

Extracted from Cisco-IOS-XE-native YANG module.
**Category:** Routing-Basics
**Paths:** 22

**HTTP Methods:**
- GET: Retrieve configuration
- PUT: Replace configuration
- PATCH: Merge/update configuration
- DELETE: Remove configuration

**YANG Model:** [⭐ Native - Routing Basics Quick Start.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/⭐ Native - Routing Basics Quick Start.yang)
